articles.title: New Schengen Visa Rules Bring Good News For Indians. Check Details - NDTV
articles.description: Indian citizens can now apply for a multiple entry Schengen visa with longer validity, the European Union (EU) said in a statement today.
articles.content:
The 2-year visa will be followed by a 5-year visa, if passport has sufficient validity left
